__e: But you have the Admiral's and my complete confidence.
The "what" is well understood by the Admiral and myself.
Forgive me, Admiral, I thought you came to form an opinion, not justify one.
Excuse me, Admiral, I don"t take orders from you.
No, Admiral, I don't think you're sorry, not one damn bit.
- I've never even met Admiral Kirk. - Admiral?
Admiral Kirk, can you hear me?
You realize, sir, they will attempt to contact Admiral Kirk... and confirm the order.
